NK013(pa)006:0: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhi
NK013(pa)006:1: ba 'bring po'i sgrub thabs ye shes char 'bebs las
NK013(pa)006:2: bsnyen pa'i las byang nyung ngur dril ba bzhugs so
NK013(pa)006:4: mchog tu mi 'gyur bde chen rdo rje'i bdag /
NK013(pa)006:5: mkha' ltar kun khyab dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i gtso //
NK013(pa)006:6: rigs kyi bdag po rig pa'i rdo rje la //
NK013(pa)006:7: rnam kun 'du 'bral med pa'i phyag gis 'dud //
NK013(pa)006:8: gsang chen rgyud sde'i yang zhun snying po'i bcud //
NK013(pa)006:9: tshe gcig sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i gsang lam che //
NK013(pa)006:10: dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i bsnyen pa la /
NK013(pa)006:12: / 'jug pa'i las byang snying por dril te brjod //
NK013(pa)006:13: de la 'dir slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba'i
NK013(pa)006:14: bsnyen pa sogs la nye bar mkho ba'i las byang
NK013(pa)006:15: gnas skabs su khyer bde ba zhig 'bring po las
NK013(pa)006:16: cung zad bsdus te gter chen chos kyi rgyal po'i
NK013(pa)006:17: gsung sor bzhag ste bri ba la /
NK013(pa)006:18: thog mar sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang
NK013(pa)006:19: gis smin cing dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas
NK013(pa)006:20: pas rgyud dag pa'i gang zag rang gzhan gyi don
NK013(pa)006:21: gnyis sgrub pa'i phyir mchog thun gyi dngos grub don
NK013(pa)006:22: du gnyer ba dag gi bsam gtan dang rjes su
NK013(pa)006:23: mthun pa'i gnas su yo byad rnams tshogs par byas
NK013(pa)006:24: te / rten mchod tshul bzhin bshams pa'i mdun du
NK013(pa)006:25: stan bde ba la 'khod nas ji ltar sgyub pa'i
NK013(pa)006:26: rim pa dngos la gsum ste /
NK013(pa)006:31: thog mar rgyud sbyang ba ni /
NK013(pa)006:32: rang gi snying ga'i h'u gi 'od zer gyis rang bzhin gyi gnas nas /
NK013(pa)006:33: bla ma dang gnyis su med pa'i dpal rdo rje
NK013(pa)006:34: sems dpa' la phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i skyabs yul ma
NK013(pa)006:35: tshang ba med pas bskor ba thams cad mdun gyi
NK013(pa)006:36: nam mkhar badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs sad par byas la
NK013(pa)006:37: / bdag dang mkha' mnyam sems can rnams //
NK013(pa)006:38: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal //
NK013(pa)006:39: dus gsum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)006:40: mchog gsum bsten pa'i zhing gyur la //
NK013(pa)006:41: gnyis med yid kyis skyabs su mchi //
NK013(pa)006:42: dngos 'byor yid kyis rnam sprul pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:43: dag pa'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK013(pa)006:44: dngos grub chu bo gcod pa'i gegs //
NK013(pa)006:45: nyes byas ma lus bshags par bgyi //
NK013(pa)006:46: phyogs bcu 'khor gsum dag pa'i zhing //
NK013(pa)006:47: ma chags spyod la rjes yi rang //
NK013(pa)006:48: dag pa'i mtha' bzhi dri ma med //
NK013(pa)006:49: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do //
NK013(pa)006:50: bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' la //
NK013(pa)006:51: dag pa gsum gyi lus dbul lo //
NK013(pa)006:52: tshe rabs bgrangs pa'i las rnams kun //
NK013(pa)006:53: bsdus te byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK013(pa)006:54: zhes lan gsum la sogs par brjod la /
NK013(pa)006:55: tshogs zhing rnams rang la bsdus te ka dag gnyis
NK013(pa)006:56: su med pa'i klong du rang babs su mnyam par
NK013(pa)006:57: bzhag go // gnyis pa mtshams bcad pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:59: 'di ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad
NK013(pa)006:60: stong zhing bdag med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang
NK013(pa)006:63: h'u badz+ra d+h+rika zhes brjod pas /
NK013(pa)006:64: rang nyid skad cig gis rdo rje sems dpa' mthing
NK013(pa)006:65: ga rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i skur bsgom
NK013(pa)006:66: mo // rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcas te /
NK013(pa)006:68: lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni //
NK013(pa)006:69: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te //
NK013(pa)006:70: sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni //
NK013(pa)006:71: rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yin //
NK013(pa)006:72: rdo rje sems dpa' nga gnas pas //
NK013(pa)006:73: ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro //
NK013(pa)006:74: h'u badz+ra dz+wa l+aa na l+aarka h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:76: de nas yid kyis sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rim bzhin bsgyur te so so'i rgya dang bcas /
NK013(pa)006:77: tsakra dz+wa l+aa na l+aarka h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:78: s+w+aam rat+na dz+wa l+aa na +aam pad+ma dz+wa l+aa na h+aam khat+ga dz+wa l+aa na l+aarka h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:80: rigs lnga'i phyag rgya las phyag mtshan phra mo grangs
NK013(pa)006:81: med pa spros te bdud bgegs log par 'dren pa
NK013(pa)006:83: tshur 'dus pa la phyogs mtshams thams cad phyag rgya
NK013(pa)006:84: rnam pa lnga'i gur khang ye shes kyi me kha
NK013(pa)006:85: dog lngar 'bar zhing 'phro ba dang bcas pas phyogs
NK013(pa)006:86: thams cad yongs su khyab cing cis kyang mi shigs
NK013(pa)006:88: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
NK013(pa)006:89: pad+ma ral gri che mchog gis //
NK013(pa)006:90: nyid kyis mtshan du gsol ba ni //
NK013(pa)006:91: cis kyang mi phyed mi shigs la //
NK013(pa)006:92: cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas //
NK013(pa)006:93: bde chen mchog tu gyur pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:96: bla ma rig 'dzin zhi khro rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i
NK013(pa)006:97: tshogs dang bcas pa mngon sum du sad pa'i spyan
NK013(pa)006:98: sngar / sems can thams cad kyi don du mchog
NK013(pa)006:99: gi byang chub tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon du bya
NK013(pa)006:101: tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i mi dge ba'i las rnams la gnong zhing 'gyod /
NK013(pa)006:102: phyin chad srog la bab kyang mi bgyid /
NK013(pa)006:103: sngar byas kyi gnyen por rnal 'byor gyi rim pa la 'jug par bagyi'o snyam pa'i sems brtan pos /
NK013(pa)006:107: ye nas gnyis med chos skur dag pa las //
NK013(pa)006:108: ma rig dbang gis sgro dang skur btab ste //
NK013(pa)006:109: bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs ngo bor smin //
NK013(pa)006:110: de ldog don phyir rgyal ba'i dam nos te //
NK013(pa)006:111: bdag cag ma rig lus dang ngag sems kyis //
NK013(pa)006:112: bag med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur pas //
NK013(pa)006:113: rgyal ba 'khor bcas thugs dang ci 'gal ba //
NK013(pa)006:114: thugs rje che mnga' khyed la bzod par gsol //
NK013(pa)006:115: zhes brjod pas sdig sgrib thams cad dag par mos nas mnyam nyid kyi don la blo bzhag go //
NK013(pa)006:116: bzhi pa dam bca' ba ni /
NK013(pa)006:117: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcings te lhag bsam rtse gcig pas /
NK013(pa)006:118: rgyas par dam bca' nyi shu pa'am /
NK013(pa)006:120: kun tu bzang po bla na med pa yi //
NK013(pa)006:121: byang chub mchog tu bdag gis sems bskyed de //
NK013(pa)006:122: don dam dang ni kun rdzob byang chub sems //
NK013(pa)006:123: deng nas tshul bzhin yongs su bzung bar bgyi //
NK013(pa)006:124: zhes byas pas kyang chog go //
NK013(pa)006:125: lnga pa byin dbab pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:126: ye shes kyi 'khor lo thams cad mkha' khyab tu sad par byas la /
NK013(pa)006:127: h'u a la la hoh b+ha ga w+aan sa ma ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)006:128: 'phags mchog thugs rje' dus la bab //
NK013(pa)006:129: khyad par bstan pa'i dus la bab //
NK013(pa)006:130: mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus la bab //
NK013(pa)006:131: byin gyis rlob pa'i dus la bab //
NK013(pa)006:132: dbang mchog bskur ba'i dus la bab //
NK013(pa)006:133: dngos grub stsol ba'i dus la bab //
NK013(pa)006:135: byin chen byin phob bcom ldan 'das //
NK013(pa)006:136: dbang chen dbang bskur bcom ldan 'das //
NK013(pa)006:137: dngos grub mchog stsol bcom ldan 'das //
NK013(pa)006:138: bdag cag las 'bras mchis par mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:139: rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra sbyar zhing /
NK013(pa)006:140: h'u h'u h'u h'u gis bsdus pas /
NK013(pa)006:141: nam mkha' gang ba'i lha tshogs thams cad bdag gnas yo byad rnams la thim ste /
NK013(pa)006:142: sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor los byin gyis brlabs par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:143: drug pa mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:145: ma h+aa sh+au nya ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham gis sbyang /
NK013(pa)006:146: stong pa'i ngang las rang nyid rdor sems su gsal
NK013(pa)006:147: ba'i thugs ka'i h'u las a d+h+au pu +aa gan
NK013(pa)006:149: nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab /
NK013(pa)006:151: 'khor 'das kyi rtsi bcud thams cad bsdus nas mchod rdzas rnams la thim par gyur /
NK013(pa)006:152: na mah sa man+ta bud+d+h+aa nam ga ga na kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:153: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK013(pa)006:156: bde mchog sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po'i rol pa las /
NK013(pa)006:157: rdo rje zhabs bsil ma la sogs pa /
NK013(pa)006:158: mchod pa'i lha mo khrus gzhong dang /
NK013(pa)006:159: spos khang man+d+ha ra'i me tog la sogs pa thogs
NK013(pa)006:160: pa nam mkha' gang ba rnams su gyur par bsam
NK013(pa)006:162: nang mchod bdud rtsi bsang sbyang rgyas par gzhung bzhin dang /
NK013(pa)006:165: stong pa'i ngang las bdud rtsi'i snod du dam rdzas
NK013(pa)006:166: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rigs lnga yab yum gyi
NK013(pa)006:167: sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnams 'od du zhu nas
NK013(pa)006:168: yongs su gyur pa las rigs lnga yab yum gyi
NK013(pa)006:169: skur gyur te de rnams rjes chags kyi sbyor bas
NK013(pa)006:170: zhu ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i
NK013(pa)006:172: gyis mtshan pa'i kha gcod rdo rje rgya gram gyi
NK013(pa)006:173: lte ba dang rwa rnams su rta mgrin yum bzhi
NK013(pa)006:174: dang bcas pa gsal bar gyur /
NK013(pa)006:175: gyi 'od zer gyis 'khor 'das kyi bdud rtsi thams cad bkug /
NK013(pa)006:176: dam tshig gi bdud rtsi dang gnyis su med par
NK013(pa)006:177: gyur pa las ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho
NK013(pa)006:178: chen por gyur par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:179: g.yon pa'i mtheb srin gyi rdo rjes bdud rtsi la reg ste /
NK013(pa)006:180: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihth+aah zhes bzla zhing g.yon skor du dkrugs te /
NK013(pa)006:181: h'u h'u h'u h'u zhes brjod pas yum bzhi bdud rtsi la thim par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:183: stong pa'i ngang las gtor gzhong pad+ma'i snod yangs shing
NK013(pa)006:184: rgya che ba'i nang du gtor rdzas 'dod yon gyi
NK013(pa)006:185: rnam pa ma tshang ba med pa la gyis mtshan
NK013(pa)006:186: par gyur / ba lid+ta te dz+wa ba lid+ta ba
NK013(pa)006:187: la b+aa d+ya gu h+ya sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa
NK013(pa)006:188: par gyur / / lan bdud brjod pas /
NK013(pa)006:189: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs lha mo nam mkha'
NK013(pa)006:190: gang bas 'dod yon dpag tu med par spro ba'i
NK013(pa)006:191: bdag nyid du gyur par bsam /
NK013(pa)006:193: stong pa'i ngang las dmar gyi dung chen yangs shing
NK013(pa)006:194: rgya che ba'i nang du rak+ta la ra yig dmar
NK013(pa)006:196: ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+da la h'u h+r+aih th+aah
NK013(pa)006:197: chags med rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrug pas nam
NK013(pa)006:199: shin tu bsdu na sngags rnams lan gsum gsum brjod pas kyang 'grub bo //
NK013(pa)006:201: khyad par sbyor ba sems bskyed pa dang /
NK013(pa)006:202: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dngos dang gnyis las /
NK013(pa)006:203: dang po la kun rdzob sems bskyed ni /
NK013(pa)006:204: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
NK013(pa)006:205: ye nas sangs rgyas yin mod kyang //
NK013(pa)006:206: rtog pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba las //
NK013(pa)006:207: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
NK013(pa)006:209: e ma 'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK013(pa)006:210: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK013(pa)006:211: skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
NK013(pa)006:212: skyes pa nyid na skye ba med //
NK013(pa)006:213: ces pa tsam gyis kyang rung la spro na lnga ga rgyas par ram yang na /
NK013(pa)006:214: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK013(pa)006:215: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK013(pa)006:217: rang bzhin med las de ltar snang //
NK013(pa)006:218: snang dus nyid nas de dngos med //
NK013(pa)006:220: gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa dngos la /
NK013(pa)006:221: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyis khog dbub pa /
NK013(pa)006:222: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa /
NK013(pa)006:223: las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang gsum /
NK013(pa)006:226: dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa //
NK013(pa)006:227: rtog pa'i smra bsam yul las 'das //
NK013(pa)006:228: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
NK013(pa)006:229: de phyir dngos po dngos med pa'o /
NK013(pa)006:231: / 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad mi dmigs shing
NK013(pa)006:232: spros pa dang bral ba stong pa nyid du bsgom
NK013(pa)006:234: de bzhin nyid ni spros med kyang /
NK013(pa)006:235: rang bzhin kun tu snang ba'i dbyings //
NK013(pa)006:236: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
NK013(pa)006:237: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
NK013(pa)006:238: de bzhin nyid ma rtogs pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK013(pa)006:239: sems can rnams la 'dzin med sgyu ma lta bu'i
NK013(pa)006:240: snying rjee chen po mkha' khyab tu bsgom pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:242: dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin //
NK013(pa)006:244: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK013(pa)006:245: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
NK013(pa)006:246: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK013(pa)006:247: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //
NK013(pa)006:248: yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya //
NK013(pa)006:250: rang rig snang stong gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin a dkar po'i rnam par bsgom pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:251: de nyid brtan pa'i yan lag tu spro bsdu bya ba ni /
NK013(pa)006:253: a yig las a grangs med pa nam mkha' gang bar 'phros /
NK013(pa)006:255: mkha' khyab kyi a rnams gzhi'i a la thim par gyur /
NK013(pa)006:257: rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las //
NK013(pa)006:258: shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro //
NK013(pa)006:259: phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas //
NK013(pa)006:261: de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun //
NK013(pa)006:262: spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin no /
NK013(pa)006:264: / 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi //
NK013(pa)006:265: brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no //
NK013(pa)006:266: zhes pa'i don dran par bya'o //
NK013(pa)006:268: rten gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
NK013(pa)006:269: brten pa lha bsgom pa gnyis kyi /
NK013(pa)006:271: dang po gzhi dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:272: sems nyid a dkar po dri ma med par gsal ba las /
NK013(pa)006:273: e yam wam lam sum ram rnams chad /
NK013(pa)006:276: 'phro 'dus 'od du zhu ba las rim pa bzhin
NK013(pa)006:277: e las nam mkha'i chos kyi 'byung gnas 'byams klas
NK013(pa)006:278: pa'i dbyings su / yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ljang khu g.yo ba'i ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
NK013(pa)006:279: wam las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po //
NK013(pa)006:280: lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi /
NK013(pa)006:281: sam las rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab zur bzhi pa /
NK013(pa)006:282: ram las me'i khor yug nam mkha'i mtha' klas par 'bar ba'o //
NK013(pa)006:283: gnyis pa rten gzhal yas khang bskyed pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:284: ri rab kyi steng du rgyu yi a las b+h+r+aum chad /
NK013(pa)006:287: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shu d+d+he badz+ra dz+ny+aa na tsakra man+dala b+h+r+aum /
NK013(pa)006:288: b+h+au yig yongs su gyur pa las /
NK013(pa)006:289: ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang
NK013(pa)006:290: gru bzhi sgo bzhi nang nas rim pa bzhin mthing
NK013(pa)006:291: dkar ser dmar ljang ba'i rin po che'i rtsig pa
NK013(pa)006:292: rim pa lnga dang ldan pa rin po che'i pha
NK013(pa)006:293: gu d+r+wa ba d+r+wa phyed shar bu mda' yab gdugs
NK013(pa)006:294: dang rgyal mtshan ba dan rin po che'i tog stong
NK013(pa)006:295: 'od zer mtha' yas par spro ba /
NK013(pa)006:296: phyi nang gi rgyan dang bkod pa ngo mtshar du mas khyad par du 'phags pa /
NK013(pa)006:297: gzhal yas khang gi mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa
NK013(pa)006:298: dwangs shing sgrib pa med par kun tu gsal ba
NK013(pa)006:299: / gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la rdzogs par bsam zhing /
NK013(pa)006:300: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK013(pa)006:301: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni //
NK013(pa)006:302: rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK013(pa)006:305: / 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
NK013(pa)006:306: gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang //
NK013(pa)006:307: kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan //
NK013(pa)006:308: rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin //
NK013(pa)006:310: gsum pa gdan bskyed pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:311: gzhal nas khang gi dbus kyi lte ba dang rtsibs bzhi la rim pa bzhin dbus su seng ge /
NK013(pa)006:315: byang du mkha' lding rnams kyis btegs pa'i rin po
NK013(pa)006:316: che'i khri bkod pa phul du byung ba'i steng du
NK013(pa)006:317: / sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK013(pa)006:318: zla ba nya gang ba ste gdan lnga brtsegs /
NK013(pa)006:320: gru chad kyi grwa bzhir pad+ma dang nyi zla'i gdan sum brtsegs /
NK013(pa)006:321: khyams kyi shar nub gnyis su rin po che'i khrir pad nyi zla ba'i gdan bzhi brtsegs /
NK013(pa)006:322: lho byang dang mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan re re /
NK013(pa)006:323: sgo bzhir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re rnams gsal bar bsam la /
NK013(pa)006:324: seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
NK013(pa)006:325: nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la //
NK013(pa)006:326: nyi zla pad+ma rin po che //
NK013(pa)006:328: gnyis pa lha bskyed pa la gsum ste /
NK013(pa)006:331: dbang bskur byin gyis brlab pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:333: gzhi'i a nyid las yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
NK013(pa)006:334: thon te so so'i gdan steng du 'khod pa ni
NK013(pa)006:336: rtsibs bzhi'i shar du ta ta /
NK013(pa)006:340: rtsibs mchan gyi shar lho'i gdan la ka tsa /
NK013(pa)006:344: gru chad kyi shar lho'i gdan la pa ya /
NK013(pa)006:356: sgo bzhi'i shar sgor nga sha /
NK013(pa)006:360: de rnams rang rang gi lha'i kha dog dang mthun par so so'i gdan la 'khod pa'i mthar /
NK013(pa)006:361: a zhes brjod pas gzhi'i a de 'od du zhu
NK013(pa)006:362: nas yig 'bru rnams la khyab par thim pas shin
NK013(pa)006:363: tu gsal zhing 'bar bar bsam la /
NK013(pa)006:364: a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i //
NK013(pa)006:365: ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK013(pa)006:366: sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus //
NK013(pa)006:367: mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges //
NK013(pa)006:369: ces brjod pas yig 'bru rnams las 'od zer 'phros /
NK013(pa)006:370: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs /
NK013(pa)006:372: slar 'dus nas yig 'bru rnams la thim pa 'od du zhu ba las /
NK013(pa)006:374: zhes brjod pas dbus su rdo rje dang dril bu /
NK013(pa)006:375: rtsibs bzhi'i shar du 'khor lo dang dril bu /
NK013(pa)006:376: lhor rin po che dang dril bu //
NK013(pa)006:377: nub tu pad+ma dang dril bu //
NK013(pa)006:378: byang du ral gri dang dril bu //
NK013(pa)006:379: rtsibs mchan gyi shar lhor rin po che'i myu gu dang me long /
NK013(pa)006:380: lho nub tu ral gri dang phreng ba /
NK013(pa)006:381: nub byang du pad+ma dang pi wam /
NK013(pa)006:382: byang shar du rdo rje dang rnga yab /
NK013(pa)006:383: gru chad bzhi'i shar lhor klu shing dang spos khang /
NK013(pa)006:384: lho nub tu pusti dang me tog /
NK013(pa)006:385: nub byang du rin po che'i snye ma dang mar me /
NK013(pa)006:386: byang shar du ut+pala dang dri chab /
NK013(pa)006:387: khyams kyi shar du rdo rje /
NK013(pa)006:395: shar sgor n+ri mgo gdengs pa dang lcags kyu /
NK013(pa)006:396: lho sgor rdo rje rtse lnga dang zhags pa /
NK013(pa)006:397: nub sgor thod dbyug sbrul gyis dkris pa dang lcags sgrog /
NK013(pa)006:398: byang du rdo rje rgya gram dang dril bu ste phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gyur /
NK013(pa)006:401: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs /
NK013(pa)006:403: slar 'dus nas phyag mtshan rnams la thim pa yongs su gyur pa las /
NK013(pa)006:405: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das
NK013(pa)006:406: rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog mthing ga mthing dkar
NK013(pa)006:407: dmar ba'i zhal gsum phyag drug gi g.yas dang po
NK013(pa)006:409: g.yon dang po dril bu dkur brten pas yum la 'khyud pa /
NK013(pa)006:410: bar pa gnyis 'khor lo dang rin po che /
NK013(pa)006:411: tha ma gnyis kyi pad+ma dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:412: dbu skra ral pa'i thor tshugs can /
NK013(pa)006:413: zhabs gnyis rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:415: de'i pang du yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
NK013(pa)006:416: ma sngon mo phyag g.yas dril bu 'dzin pas yab
NK013(pa)006:418: g.yon rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:419: brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung gis 'khril ba /
NK013(pa)006:420: gnyis ka'ang lha rdzas kyi dar dkar po gser gyi ngang ris can gyi stod g.yogs dang /
NK013(pa)006:422: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i cod pan /
NK013(pa)006:424: gar gyi phu dung ste dar gyi chas gos lnga dang /
NK013(pa)006:431: phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu ste rin po che'i rgyan brgyad kyis mdzes par spras pa /
NK013(pa)006:432: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can /
NK013(pa)006:433: gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin ldan pa ste /
NK013(pa)006:434: zhi ba'i nyams dgu rgyas pa /
NK013(pa)006:435: 'od zer kha dog drug re re yang bye ba
NK013(pa)006:436: phrag drug drug tu 'phro zhing 'bar ba'i klong na
NK013(pa)006:437: bde stong gnyis su med pa'i ngo bor bzhugs pa'o
NK013(pa)006:440: shar gyi rtsibs la rnam par snang mdzad dang spyan
NK013(pa)006:441: ma yab yum dkar po 'khor lo dang dril bu
NK013(pa)006:444: lhor rin chen 'byung ldan dang m+aa ma k+ai yab yum ser po rin po che dang dril bu /
NK013(pa)006:447: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dang gos dkar mo yab yum dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu /
NK013(pa)006:450: byang du don yod grub pa dang sgrol ma yab yum ljang gu ral gri dang dril bu /
NK013(pa)006:451: yab rnams g.yas rang rtags thugs kar 'dzin cing /
NK013(pa)006:452: g.yon dril bu dkur brten pas yum la 'khyud nas zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK013(pa)006:453: yum rnams g.yas dril bu 'dzin pas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud cing /
NK013(pa)006:454: g.yon rang rtags thugs kar 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:455: zhabs brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung gis rol pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:457: rtsibs mchan bzhi'i shar lhor sa snying dkar po rin po che'i myu gu /
NK013(pa)006:458: h'u l+aa s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)006:459: sgeg mo dkar mo me long /
NK013(pa)006:461: lho nub tu nam snying ser po ral gri /
NK013(pa)006:462: tram m+aa l+ye sa ma ya hoh phreng ba ma ser mo rin po che'i phreng ba /
NK013(pa)006:463: h+r+aim h+aa h'u pad+ma pra da ma /
NK013(pa)006:464: nub byang du spyan ras gzigs dmar po pad dkar /
NK013(pa)006:465: h+r+aim g+ai ti r+aa ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)006:466: glu ma dmar mo pi wam /
NK013(pa)006:468: byang shar du phyag rdor mthing kha rdo rje /
NK013(pa)006:469: a nirti r+aa ga ya mye /
NK013(pa)006:470: gar ma ljang gu rnga yab 'dzin pas gar rgya mdzad pa /
NK013(pa)006:471: mee d+ha ra ne s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:472: gru chad bzhi'i shar lhor byams pa dkar po klu shing /
NK013(pa)006:474: bdug spos ma dkar ser spos khang /
NK013(pa)006:475: th+l+him nis+sa ram b+ha ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:476: lho nub tu sgrib sel dmar po chos kyi 'khor lo //
NK013(pa)006:478: me tog ma dmar ser me tog gi phreng ba /
NK013(pa)006:479: h'u sa r+aa dza ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:480: nub byang du kun bzang dmar ljang rin po che'i snye ma /
NK013(pa)006:481: b+aam d+ai pa su gi r+ai /
NK013(pa)006:482: mar me ma dmar ljang mar me /
NK013(pa)006:483: m+aum sh+r+ai am r+aa ga ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:484: byang shar du 'jam dpal dkar ljang ut+pala /
NK013(pa)006:486: dri chab ma dkar ljang dri'i dung chos /
NK013(pa)006:487: sems dpa' rnams g.yas rang rtags dang /
NK013(pa)006:488: g.yon dril bu dkur brten pas yum la 'khyud pa /
NK013(pa)006:489: zhabs g.yas cung zad brkyang ba'i phyed skyil gyis bzhugs shing /
NK013(pa)006:490: sems ma rnams g.yas yab la 'khyud cing g.yon rang rtags 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:491: zhabs g.yon cung zad brkyang pa'i phyed skyil gyi yab la rol pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:493: khyams kyi shar du kun tu bzang po mthing ga
NK013(pa)006:494: mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya can rdo rje'i skyil mo
NK013(pa)006:496: a a a badz+r+ai b+ha dra sa man+ta +aah nub
NK013(pa)006:497: tu kun tu bzang mo mthing ga g.yon steng du
NK013(pa)006:498: bzhag pa'i mnyam bzhag gi phyag rgya can pad+ma'i skyil
NK013(pa)006:502: kun bzang yab yum rnams zhi ba'i rgyan chas bcu
NK013(pa)006:503: gsum gyis mdzes shing tshul dgu'i nyams kyis rgyas pa'o
NK013(pa)006:505: khyams kyi shar lhor lha'i thub pa dkar po pi wam 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:506: mu ne h'u t+r+aum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:507: byang du lha min gya thub pa mthing ga go matshona'adzina pa /
NK013(pa)006:509: lhor mi yi thub pa ser po gseg par 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:511: nub byang du byol song gi thub pa dmar nag pusti 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:513: lho nub tu yi dwags kyi thub pa ser nag rin po che'i sgrom bu 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:515: byang shar du dmyal ba'i thub pa dud kha me chu 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:516: drug ka'ang dbu gtsug tor dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa'i cha lugs can /
NK013(pa)006:517: 'gro ba'i don la 'greng stabs su gshegs pa'i tshul can no //
NK013(pa)006:519: shar sgor gshin rje'i gshed smug nag n+ri mgo gdengs pa 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:520: ma h+aa badz+ra d+ha ro ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:521: lcags kyu ma smug nag lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK013(pa)006:523: lho sgor stobs po che ser nag rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:524: ma h+aa rat+na d+ha ro ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:525: zhags pa ma ser nag zhags pa 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK013(pa)006:527: nub sgor rta mgrin dmar nag thod dbyug sbrul gyis dkris pa 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:528: ma h+aa pad+ma d+ha ro ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:529: lcags sgrog ma dmar nag lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK013(pa)006:530: h'u big+h+n+aam ta krita h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:531: byang sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ljang nag rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:532: ma h+aa karma d+ha ro ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai dz+wa l+ai ni h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:533: dril bu ma ljang nag dril bu 'dzin pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba /
NK013(pa)006:534: khro bo bzhi ka'ang g.yon sdigs mdzub mdzad cing //
NK013(pa)006:535: yum rnams g.yon pa dung khrag stob pa'i tshul can /
NK013(pa)006:536: thams cad kyang khro zhing gtum pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can /
NK013(pa)006:537: gar gyi nyams dgus sgeg cing /
NK013(pa)006:538: dur khrod rol pa'i chas brgyad kyis brgyan te /
NK013(pa)006:539: bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na gdug pa can tshar gcod pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa /
NK013(pa)006:540: de ltar rten dang brten par bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang me long gi gzug brnyan nam /
NK013(pa)006:541: chu nang gi zla ba ltar snang stong sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lor bzhugs pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:542: gnyis pa gsal gdab pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:543: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul /
NK013(pa)006:545: / 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK013(pa)006:546: g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //
NK013(pa)006:547: myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas //
NK013(pa)006:548: gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //
NK013(pa)006:549: thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams //
NK013(pa)006:550: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas //
NK013(pa)006:551: bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //
NK013(pa)006:552: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
NK013(pa)006:553: bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan //
NK013(pa)006:554: sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni //
NK013(pa)006:555: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas //
NK013(pa)006:556: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
NK013(pa)006:558: ut+pala klu shing la sogs mtshan //
NK013(pa)006:559: rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar //
NK013(pa)006:561: chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye //
NK013(pa)006:562: gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang //
NK013(pa)006:563: pi wam gar mkhan mchog nyid de //
NK013(pa)006:564: me tog phreng ba spos mchod ma //
NK013(pa)006:565: mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:566: las la 'khril zhing chos la brten //
NK013(pa)006:568: gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin //
NK013(pa)006:569: gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril //
NK013(pa)006:570: sgo bzhir khro bo'i phyag rgya ni //
NK013(pa)006:571: n+ri mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon //
NK013(pa)006:572: thod sprul chen po gnon pa dang //
NK013(pa)006:573: rdo rje rgya gram las kyi gnon //
NK013(pa)006:574: lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta hoh sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang /
NK013(pa)006:577: thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK013(pa)006:578: mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug tu bstan //
NK013(pa)006:579: gseg par dang ni pi wam dang //
NK013(pa)006:580: go cha pu sti rin chen sgrom //
NK013(pa)006:581: me dang chu ni rab tu bstan //
NK013(pa)006:582: yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings //
NK013(pa)006:583: kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro //
NK013(pa)006:584: yum gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i skyil //
NK013(pa)006:585: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK013(pa)006:586: yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam //
NK013(pa)006:587: yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid //
NK013(pa)006:588: mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan //
NK013(pa)006:589: ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:590: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //
NK013(pa)006:591: gsal 'tshe lhun sdug gzi byin ldan /
NK013(pa)006:596: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi //
NK013(pa)006:597: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK013(pa)006:599: gsum pa dbang bskur ba dang /
NK013(pa)006:600: byin gyis brlab pa gnyis las /
NK013(pa)006:602: de ltar gsal ba'i lha tshogs thams cad kyi srog
NK013(pa)006:603: gi gor rang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' rgyan
NK013(pa)006:604: dang phyag mtshan spangs pa re re'i thugs kar so
NK013(pa)006:605: so'i phyag mtshan gyi lte bar sa bon la sngags
NK013(pa)006:606: phreng gis bskor bas mtshan par bsam la /
NK013(pa)006:607: sa bon rnams las 'od zer 'phros par phyogs bcu
NK013(pa)006:608: dus bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dbang gi
NK013(pa)006:609: lha rigs lnga yab yum gyi rnam par badz+ra sa
NK013(pa)006:610: m+aa dzahs spyan drags par bsam la /
NK013(pa)006:611: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)006:613: de rnams gnyis su med par sbyor ba mdzad /
NK013(pa)006:614: rjes chags kyi mes zhu ba'i ye shes lnga'i chu
NK013(pa)006:615: rgyun mgo bo'i gnas lngar babs te dbang bskur bas
NK013(pa)006:616: nyon mongs pa lnga'i dri ma sbyangs /
NK013(pa)006:617: phung po lnga rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas su gnas 'gyur /
NK013(pa)006:618: chu'i lhag ma spyi bor brtan pa yongs su gyur
NK013(pa)006:619: pa las rang rang gi rigs bdag bdag por gyur
NK013(pa)006:620: pa'i rigs lnga sprul sku'i cha byad can gyis dbu
NK013(pa)006:622: de yang rdo rje mi bskyod pa la mtshon na
NK013(pa)006:623: rdo rje bsdam pa las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba
NK013(pa)006:625: ma h+aa sh+au nya ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)006:626: phyag rgya de las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba dpral bar bzhag la /
NK013(pa)006:627: ma h+aa +aa dar+sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra s+w+aa b+h+aa srin lan brkyang ba rna ltag g.yas par /
NK013(pa)006:628: ma h+aa sa ma t+aa dz+ny+aa na mthe bong brkyang ba ltag par /
NK013(pa)006:629: ma h+aa pra t+ya bek+sha na dz+ny+aa na mthe chung brkyang ba rna ltag g.yon par /
NK013(pa)006:630: ma h+aa kri t+y+aa nush+tha na dz+ny+aa na zhes pas /
NK013(pa)006:631: gtso bo yab yum byed po yab yum thub pa
NK013(pa)006:632: drug dang bcu la mi bskyod pa bdag por gyur
NK013(pa)006:633: pa'i rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbu brgyan par gyur
NK013(pa)006:634: / des mtshon nas rigs gzhan bzhi la'ang rigs gang
NK013(pa)006:635: yin pa de'i sngags dang por brjod cing spyi bo'i
NK013(pa)006:637: gang dbus su song ba'i sngags rgya dang rigs bdag gi shul du mi bskyod pa 'jog pa las /
NK013(pa)006:638: rnam snang gi rgya dang a dar+sha dang por brjod pa'i sngags tshan lngas /
NK013(pa)006:639: rnam snang sa snying byams pa gshin rje'i gshed rnams
NK013(pa)006:640: yum dang bcas pa la rnam snang bdag por gyur
NK013(pa)006:641: pa'i rigs lnga'i sa man+ta dang por brjod pa'i sngags
NK013(pa)006:642: tshan lngas / rin 'byung nam snying sgrib sel stobs
NK013(pa)006:643: po che rnams yum dang bcas pa la rin 'byung
NK013(pa)006:644: bdag por pra t+ya dang por brjod pa'i sngags tshan
NK013(pa)006:645: tshan lngas / lngas / snang mtha' spyan ras gzigs
NK013(pa)006:646: kun bzang rta mgrin rnams yum dang bcas pa la
NK013(pa)006:647: snang mtha' bdag por kri t+y+aa dang por brjod pa'i
NK013(pa)006:648: tshan lngas / lngas / sngags mtshan lngas / don
NK013(pa)006:649: grub phyag rdor 'jam dpal bdud rtsi 'khyil ba rnams
NK013(pa)006:650: yum dang bcas pa la don grub bdag por gyur
NK013(pa)006:651: pa'i rigs lnga'i cod pan gyis dbu brgyan par bsam
NK013(pa)006:652: tshan lngas / lngas / sngags mtshan lngas / mo
NK013(pa)006:653: // phung po lnga dag pa rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
NK013(pa)006:655: rigs lnga'i dbang rgya gnas so sor 'jog cing dbang sngags brjod pa'o //
NK013(pa)006:657: lha thams cad kyi spyi bor zla ba la dkar po /
NK013(pa)006:658: mgrin par pad+ma la +aam dmar po /
NK013(pa)006:659: snying khar nyi ma la h'u sngon po /
NK013(pa)006:660: de rnams kyi 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rgyud bskul /
NK013(pa)006:661: rdo rje gsum gyi lha tshogs nam mkha' gang bar byon /
NK013(pa)006:663: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs dang gnyis su med par gyur /
NK013(pa)006:664: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa la spyi bor rnam snang dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:665: mgrin par snang mtha' dmar po pad+ma 'dzin pa /
NK013(pa)006:666: snying khar mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje 'dzin
NK013(pa)006:667: pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab par bsam zhing rdo rje'i
NK013(pa)006:668: phyag rgya gnas gsum du bzhag la /
NK013(pa)006:669: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa k+aa ya badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)006:670: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa w+aa ka sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa tsit+ta zhes brjod /
NK013(pa)006:672: gtso bo'i mngon rtogs tsam kyis mthar bskyed sngags rnams tshang bar brjod nas /
NK013(pa)006:673: de ltar rten dang brten par sogs kyi mthar /
NK013(pa)006:674: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK013(pa)006:676: dbang bskur rgyas gdab rnams sngags rgya tsam gyis chog go //
NK013(pa)006:677: gsum pa las kyi rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhi ste /
NK013(pa)006:678: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang ba /
NK013(pa)006:685: rig pa'i me tog dor ba /
NK013(pa)006:686: dngos grub bskul nas bstim zhing brtan par bya ba'o //
NK013(pa)006:688: gtso bo'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar dwangs ma'i
NK013(pa)006:689: srog h'u yig mthing ga ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin
NK013(pa)006:691: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul bas /
NK013(pa)006:692: chos sku 'gyur ba med pa'i ngang las /
NK013(pa)006:693: gzugs sku bzhi bcu rtsaganyisa sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyi
NK013(pa)006:694: 'khor lo'i rnam pa can du sad par bsam la
NK013(pa)006:695: / lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas /
NK013(pa)006:696: e h+ye hi b+ha ga w+aa na ma h+aa ka
NK013(pa)006:697: ru ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam
NK013(pa)006:698: / zhes pas snyan gsan phab la /
NK013(pa)006:700: thugs rje'i lcags kyus thugs dam rgyud bskul zhing //
NK013(pa)006:701: byams pa'i zhags pas gnas nas spyan yang 'dren //
NK013(pa)006:702: lcags sgrog bka' yi pho nyas gnas bskyod la //
NK013(pa)006:703: bde gshegs bzhugs shing rnam grol dgyes pa bskyed //
NK013(pa)006:704: dam tshig pa'i thugs ka nas 'phros pa'i /
NK013(pa)006:705: dzahmh'u bam hohs dgug bcings bsdams la dgyes pa bskyed nas /
NK013(pa)006:706: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang me ri 'dab 'byar du bzhugs par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:710: h'u badz+ra sa ma ya h'u /
NK013(pa)006:711: s+w+aa badz+ra sa ma ya s+w+aa /
NK013(pa)006:712: h+aa badz+ra sa ma ya h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:714: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK013(pa)006:715: dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin
NK013(pa)006:716: las rnams rang bzhin dbyer med du rtogs par bya'o
NK013(pa)006:718: ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
NK013(pa)006:719: yon tan phrin las rmad po che //
NK013(pa)006:720: de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas //
NK013(pa)006:721: phyag rgya chen po bdag sbyor cig /
NK013(pa)006:722: ces brjod pas lha rnams dngos grub stsol ba la phyogs pa dang /
NK013(pa)006:724: ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig pa la chu
NK013(pa)006:725: la chu bzhag pa bzhin dbyer med du gyur par
NK013(pa)006:726: bsam / badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)006:727: nam mkha' lha'i dkyil 'khor nyid grub par ma gyur gyi bar brtan par byas la /
NK013(pa)006:728: badz+ra sa ma ya hoh de yang shin tu dbang
NK013(pa)006:729: du gyur te dgyes pa chen pos rjes su chags
NK013(pa)006:730: par byas / dzahmh'u bam hohzhesa brjod pas brtan cing gsal bar byas nas /
NK013(pa)006:731: k+aa ya wa k+aa tsit+ta tish+tha badz+ra /
NK013(pa)006:733: gnyis pa phyag dang mchod pa gnyis las /
NK013(pa)006:735: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo las mar me
NK013(pa)006:736: gcig las gnyis mched kyi tshul du rdo rje sems
NK013(pa)006:737: dpa' zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i rnam pas thon nas
NK013(pa)006:738: dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor 'khod de sems can thams
NK013(pa)006:739: cad dang bya byed thun mong par gyur nas phyag
NK013(pa)006:740: dang mchod pa la sogs las kyi rim pa la
NK013(pa)006:742: de'i dang po phyag 'tshal ba ni /
NK013(pa)006:743: mi rtog rdo rje thabs kyi ye shes ni //
NK013(pa)006:744: dmigs med shes rab yum gyi ngang du rtogs //
NK013(pa)006:745: thugs rje bye brag sna tshogs cir yang ston //
NK013(pa)006:746: rdo rje sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)006:747: dmigs med chos kyi sku la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK013(pa)006:748: sku la cir yang sprul pa'i sku la mi 'gyur
NK013(pa)006:749: rdo rje'i sku la mngon par byang chub sku la
NK013(pa)006:750: phyag 'tshal lo // dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis bsgrubs pa yi //
NK013(pa)006:751: tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing yon tan mthar phyin pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:752: sku dang ye shes tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)006:753: a ti p+au hoh pra ti p+au hoh zhes pas phyag bya'o //
NK013(pa)006:754: gnyis pa mchod pa la bcu gsum las /
NK013(pa)006:755: dang po phyag rgya'i mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:756: lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi sor mo'i bre kha bcu
NK013(pa)006:757: la nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rigs lnga
NK013(pa)006:758: yab yum gyi sa bon rnams kyis mtshan par bsam
NK013(pa)006:760: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:761: thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya //
NK013(pa)006:762: gsang ba de nyid nges pa yis //
NK013(pa)006:764: mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge //
NK013(pa)006:765: lnga gnyis zung du sprad pa las //
NK013(pa)006:766: sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NK013(pa)006:767: dang m+aum gnyis rtse sbyar te /
NK013(pa)006:769: / 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa //
NK013(pa)006:770: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK013(pa)006:771: bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu /
NK013(pa)006:773: / 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kun //
NK013(pa)006:774: dgyes pa chen po bskyed pa'i phyir //
NK013(pa)006:775: phyag rgya'i mchod pa chen po yis //
NK013(pa)006:776: a la la ste mchod pa 'bul //
NK013(pa)006:777: a la la ste dgyes par mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:780: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
NK013(pa)006:781: rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i ye shes kyis //
NK013(pa)006:782: srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun //
NK013(pa)006:783: kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol //
NK013(pa)006:784: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo bi shwa sogs s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:785: zhes pas phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon gyi dngos
NK013(pa)006:786: po mtha' dag spyod yul yongs su dag pa kun
NK013(pa)006:787: tu bzang po'i mchod sprin chen por 'bul lo //
NK013(pa)006:789: +aa ha ra +aa ha ra sarba bi d+y+aa d+ha
NK013(pa)006:790: ra p+au dzi te na mahs man+ta bud+d+ha nam ga
NK013(pa)006:791: ga kham sa ma ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK013(pa)006:792: zhes pas rim par phyag zhabs bsil zhing zhal du gsol bar bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:794: so so'i phyag rgya ston cing /
NK013(pa)006:795: pa na pem pe nu su ra to /
NK013(pa)006:797: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sid+d+hi hu /
NK013(pa)006:798: sa ma yo ta muhsarba ma h+aa su kha sid+d+hi hu /
NK013(pa)006:799: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK013(pa)006:803: lha mo rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs mchod
NK013(pa)006:804: nas shangs la sogs pa'i dbang bo so so la
NK013(pa)006:807: rab tu dga' bas bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK013(pa)006:808: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:809: mchod chen thams cad dag cing lhun gyis grub par mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:811: skyes dang skyes lan gyi tshul du lha rnams mnyes /
NK013(pa)006:812: lha mo rnams slar byung ste rang gi gnas bzhir
NK013(pa)006:813: thim pas sku gsung thugs phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub
NK013(pa)006:817: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK013(pa)006:818: rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag /
NK013(pa)006:819: rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman //
NK013(pa)006:820: rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos //
NK013(pa)006:821: ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas //
NK013(pa)006:822: rgyud lnga'i sems can kun grol ba //
NK013(pa)006:823: dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi sman //
NK013(pa)006:825: bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags na //
NK013(pa)006:826: thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol //
NK013(pa)006:827: bzhes nas kun tu dgyes mdzod la //
NK013(pa)006:828: bla med dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK013(pa)006:829: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK013(pa)006:832: dkon mchog gsum gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems //
NK013(pa)006:833: de stsol bla ma de rgya lhag pa'i lha //
NK013(pa)006:834: de dbang sprul pa'i 'khor lo bcas pa la //
NK013(pa)006:835: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK013(pa)006:836: sarba ta th+aa ga ta rgyal ba chos kyi sku yi dgongs pa yi //
NK013(pa)006:837: bde gshegs rigs lnga rigs gsum mgon po dang //
NK013(pa)006:838: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i bar du byin brlabs te /
NK013(pa)006:840: / 'das dang ma byon da lta dus gsum gyi //
NK013(pa)006:841: sgyu 'phrul brgyud pa'i bla ma thams cad la //
NK013(pa)006:842: sman mchod sarba ta th+aa bdag nyid chen po rigs lnga yab yum dang //
NK013(pa)006:843: byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs /
NK013(pa)006:845: / 'gro ba'i don mdzad sprul sku thub drug la /
NK013(pa)006:846: sman mchod sarba gzhan yang rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byams dang //
NK013(pa)006:847: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro dam can srung ma'i tshogs //
NK013(pa)006:848: zhing skyong gzhi bdag srid gsum ka dag la //
NK013(pa)006:849: sman mchod 'bul lo mthu dbang dngos grub stsol //
NK013(pa)006:850: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta kha ram kh+aa hi /
NK013(pa)006:851: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i zeg ma mkha' la sprin
NK013(pa)006:852: bzhin chags pa las bdud rtsi'i char chen po babs
NK013(pa)006:853: te lha tshogs rnams mnyes shing tshim par bsam la
NK013(pa)006:855: w+aa ka sid+d+hi +aah tsit+ta sid+d+hi h'u /
NK013(pa)006:856: zhes rim par brjod cing blangs nas lce la bzhag
NK013(pa)006:857: pas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bsam
NK013(pa)006:858: mo // drug pa gtor ma'i mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:859: 'dod yon gyi lha mo dpag tu med pas dkyil
NK013(pa)006:860: 'khor pa rnams dgyes pa bskyed nas rang la gnyis
NK013(pa)006:861: med du gyur par bsam zhing /
NK013(pa)006:862: +aahmh'u su ra u pa b+h+yahka m+aa la badz+ra a
NK013(pa)006:863: mri ta ha ra na pra t+aits+tsha b+ha ga wa
NK013(pa)006:864: na dzahmh'u bam hoha la la hoh bdun pa gsang
NK013(pa)006:866: +aahmh'u a la la hoh zhes lan gsum gyis dang pos lha rnams dgyes pa bskyed /
NK013(pa)006:867: gnyis pas nyan thos rnams 'gog pa las bslang /
NK013(pa)006:868: gsum pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gzhan don la bskul bar gsal gdab bo //
NK013(pa)006:869: brgyad pa ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa ni //
NK013(pa)006:870: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK013(pa)006:871: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
NK013(pa)006:872: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
NK013(pa)006:873: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang //
NK013(pa)006:874: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi //
NK013(pa)006:875: mdzes par bres shing spras pa dang //
NK013(pa)006:877: dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil //
NK013(pa)006:878: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
NK013(pa)006:879: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
NK013(pa)006:880: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK013(pa)006:881: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs //
NK013(pa)006:882: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
NK013(pa)006:883: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //
NK013(pa)006:884: rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
NK013(pa)006:885: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis //
NK013(pa)006:886: bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
NK013(pa)006:887: phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
NK013(pa)006:888: dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul //
NK013(pa)006:889: skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis //
NK013(pa)006:890: rim gyis yang na cig car du //
NK013(pa)006:891: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
NK013(pa)006:892: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom //
NK013(pa)006:895: ram las ye shes kyi me 'bar bas sems can
NK013(pa)006:896: thams cad kyi snying nang na gnas pa'i rigs drug
NK013(pa)006:897: gi sa bon bag chags dang bcas pa bsregs /
NK013(pa)006:898: rnam shes chos kyi dbyings su bsgral bar bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:902: sa ma ya hoh a nu ra go ham /
NK013(pa)006:903: a nu ra ga ya mye /
NK013(pa)006:904: dzahmh'u bam hoh h'u h'u h'u /
NK013(pa)006:907: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu r+aa ga na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)006:908: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes
NK013(pa)006:909: su chags pa dang dbyer med pa'i nga rgyal bya'o
NK013(pa)006:910: // bcu gcig pa 'dod yon ro mnyam gyi mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:912: bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo //
NK013(pa)006:913: longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni //
NK013(pa)006:915: chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol /
NK013(pa)006:917: / 'dod yon gyi snang ba thams cad lha dang lha
NK013(pa)006:918: mor dag pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad
NK013(pa)006:919: bde ba chen por ro gcig tu gyur par bsam
NK013(pa)006:920: pa ni bla na med pa'i dug gsum lam du
NK013(pa)006:922: bcu gnyis pa rol mo ye shes kyi mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:923: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa p+au dza badz+ra s+w+aa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK013(pa)006:924: zhes mchod pa'i nga rgyal bya zhing rol mo ye shes kyi sgras bskul lo //
NK013(pa)006:925: bcu gsum pa glu ye shes kyi mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:926: phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi //
NK013(pa)006:927: ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che //
NK013(pa)006:928: bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs //
NK013(pa)006:929: snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs //
NK013(pa)006:931: rdo rje bsod nams thig le che //
NK013(pa)006:932: rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan //
NK013(pa)006:933: rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa //
NK013(pa)006:934: rdo rje rgyal po thig le che //
NK013(pa)006:936: sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che //
NK013(pa)006:937: yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs //
NK013(pa)006:938: ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang /
NK013(pa)006:940: / 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che //
NK013(pa)006:942: mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings //
NK013(pa)006:943: mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs spro //
NK013(pa)006:944: mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim //
NK013(pa)006:945: sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po //
NK013(pa)006:947: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du //
NK013(pa)006:948: rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed //
NK013(pa)006:949: sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis //
NK013(pa)006:950: skad cig yul la lhun gyis grub //
NK013(pa)006:952: thams cad ma lus lhun gyis grub //
NK013(pa)006:953: sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che //
NK013(pa)006:954: sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab //
NK013(pa)006:955: sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che //
NK013(pa)006:956: hoh zhes yon tan rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas chos nyid kyi rang sgras bstod par bya'o //
NK013(pa)006:958: kun bzang zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol sman gtor rnams sngags mchod tsam byas la /
NK013(pa)006:959: bstod pa yang sho lo ka tha ma tsam gyis kyang don 'dus so //
NK013(pa)006:961: hoh spros pa med pa'i dbyings rang bzhin gyi dkyil
NK013(pa)006:962: 'khor rnam par dag pa na dus gsum du gshegs
NK013(pa)006:963: shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
NK013(pa)006:964: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bye
NK013(pa)006:965: brag dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
NK013(pa)006:966: sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs
NK013(pa)006:967: pa rigs mchog gzungs kyi yum gyi dbyings na rnam
NK013(pa)006:968: par bzhugs pa sems dpa'i tshogs /
NK013(pa)006:970: ye shes chen po'i dbang phyug /
NK013(pa)006:971: thabs la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid /
NK013(pa)006:975: ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dgongs su gsol /
NK013(pa)006:976: bdag cag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis /
NK013(pa)006:977: dang po gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i sgor khas 'ches te /
NK013(pa)006:978: dam tshig gnyan po ma nor bar gnos pa las /
NK013(pa)006:979: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi nyams chag dang zhig
NK013(pa)006:980: ral du gyur pa ci mchis pa thams cad shin
NK013(pa)006:981: tu gnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis bshags par mchis
NK013(pa)006:982: na / dbyings nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i ngang
NK013(pa)006:983: gi sku bzod pa chen po dang du bzhes nas
NK013(pa)006:984: tshangs pa mchog yid bzhin du thob par stsal du
NK013(pa)006:985: na / gsol / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku
NK013(pa)006:986: gsung thugs kyi bla man chad nas dngos grub kyi
NK013(pa)006:987: skal ba dang rigs brgyud gang lags pa thams cad
NK013(pa)006:988: phyi mar bsdad mi 'tshal bar dus da lta nyid
NK013(pa)006:989: du thob par stsal du gsol /
NK013(pa)006:990: bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon par zhugs pa rnams //
NK013(pa)006:991: bcad gtub sdug bsngal lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur yang //
NK013(pa)006:992: grib ma phog pas sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzod pas //
NK013(pa)006:993: sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang //
NK013(pa)006:994: gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa'i nyi ma stong phrag gi /
NK013(pa)006:996: / 'od bzhin 'jig rten khams 'dir rtag tu 'byung ba dang //
NK013(pa)006:997: lus ngag sems la tshe 'dir rdo rje rab snang ste //
NK013(pa)006:998: re smon thams cad dus 'di nyid du stsal du gsol //
NK013(pa)006:1000: bde bar gshegs pa khyed ci 'dra //
NK013(pa)006:1001: de 'dra kho nar bdag gyur cig /
NK013(pa)006:1002: spyod pa rmad byung bsam yas pa /
NK013(pa)006:1004: / 'gro la phan phyir bdag gis spyad //
NK013(pa)006:1005: byang chub sems mchog dam pa dang //
NK013(pa)006:1006: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya 'di //
NK013(pa)006:1007: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong na //
NK013(pa)006:1008: rdo rje rgyal pos byin rlobs mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:1010: sangs rgyas mdzad dka' bdag gis bsgrubs //
NK013(pa)006:1011: byang chub spyod dka' bdag gis spyad /
NK013(pa)006:1013: bdag cag bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /
NK013(pa)006:1014: ces brjod de shar sgor 'khod pa'i las kyi rdo
NK013(pa)006:1015: rje sems dpa' de nyid gtso bo'i thugs kar thim
NK013(pa)006:1016: par bsam mo // bzhi pa dzapa la de nyid brjod pa dang /
NK013(pa)006:1018: yang dag don gyi snying po ni //
NK013(pa)006:1019: ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang //
NK013(pa)006:1020: gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed pas //
NK013(pa)006:1021: rang rig dri med dag pa yis //
NK013(pa)006:1022: de la rtag tu mos pa ni //
NK013(pa)006:1023: bsnyen pa'i dam pa mchog yin no //
NK013(pa)006:1024: sems nyid theg par rab nges na //
NK013(pa)006:1026: d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa //
NK013(pa)006:1027: da lta nyid du mngon gyur cig /
NK013(pa)006:1028: ces de kho na nyid kyi don dran pas nges shes bskyed do //
NK013(pa)006:1030: lha rnams kyi ye shes sems dpa' so so'i thugs
NK013(pa)006:1031: kar rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi lte bar dwangs
NK013(pa)006:1032: ma'i srog h'u yig la sogs pa'i mthar bzlas bya'i
NK013(pa)006:1033: sngags kyi phreng bas bskor bar gsal btab la /
NK013(pa)006:1035: bdag gi thugs ka nas sngags kyi 'od zer mchod
NK013(pa)006:1036: pa'i tshul du spros pas ye shes kyi lha tshogs
NK013(pa)006:1037: dgyes pa bskyed / thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul /
NK013(pa)006:1038: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs dngos grub thams cad
NK013(pa)006:1039: 'od dang 'od zer gyi rnam pas bdag la stsal
NK013(pa)006:1041: dam ye 'phro 'du ste gsal ba gsum dang ldan pa'i ngang nas bzlas bya'i sngags ni /
NK013(pa)006:1042: bskyed sngags rnams rim pa bzhin brgya dang nyer gcig sogs gtso 'khor 'gros sbyar nas bzla zhing /
NK013(pa)006:1043: rtags dang dus dang grangs kyi dbye bas rab 'bring
NK013(pa)006:1044: tha ma'i tshad rdzogs kyi bar du bzla bar gsungs
NK013(pa)006:1045: so // bsnyen pa'i tshad kyang las rung tsam la gtso bo'i sngags chig 'bum /
NK013(pa)006:1046: zhi ba rigs bzhi la khri re /
NK013(pa)006:1047: sems dpa' man chad la lnga stong re gsungs pa
NK013(pa)006:1048: rnams dus kyi dbang gi bzhi 'gyur re bzla dgos
NK013(pa)006:1049: shing kha skong du spyi dzapa bo d+hi tsit+ta 'bum
NK013(pa)006:1050: phrag gcig gis mtha' brten yan chad bzla zhing de
NK013(pa)006:1051: thams cad la 'bul rjes su khri sogs bcu cha'i
NK013(pa)006:1053: bcu cha'i sbyin sreg dang bcas pa bya ba yin no //
NK013(pa)006:1054: de nas gzhi bstod rgyas pa gzhung ltar ram /
NK013(pa)006:1056: mi rtog rdo rje sogs dang /
NK013(pa)006:1059: ye gnas gnyis med sogs brjod pas nyes byas su gyur pa thams cad bshags shing dag par bya'o //
NK013(pa)006:1060: gsum pa rjes kyi cho ga la /
NK013(pa)006:1065: spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor dang lnga /
NK013(pa)006:1066: dang po tshogs kyi mchod pa la lnga las /
NK013(pa)006:1067: dang po bshams shing byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:1068: dza gad dang m+aam sa gtso bor gyur pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pa bsham nas /
NK013(pa)006:1070: ma h+aa kro d+he shwa r+ai sarba dra b+y+aam bi shwa d+ha ni h'u phata kyis bsang /
NK013(pa)006:1071: ram yam kham gis bsreg gtor bkrus te stong par sbyangs /
NK013(pa)006:1073: zhal zas kyi snod du nyi ma la h'u s+w+aa
NK013(pa)006:1074: +aam h+aa las bza' btung gi dngos po ye shes
NK013(pa)006:1075: lnga'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi ro brgya pa 'dod yon
NK013(pa)006:1076: gyi rnam pa ma tshang ba med pa so so'i
NK013(pa)006:1077: lha mo'i rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
NK013(pa)006:1078: bcas pa'i sprin 'phro bar bsam la /
NK013(pa)006:1079: yi ge gsum lan gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlabs /
NK013(pa)006:1080: gnyis pa tshogs zhing spyan 'dren pa ni //
NK013(pa)006:1081: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK013(pa)006:1082: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
NK013(pa)006:1084: tshogs mchod dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol //
NK013(pa)006:1085: bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
NK013(pa)006:1086: rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang /
NK013(pa)006:1088: / 'khor gyi sems dpa' sems ma dang //
NK013(pa)006:1089: kun bzang sprul pa'i tshogs chen dang //
NK013(pa)006:1090: sgo ba bzhi sogs gshegs su gsol //
NK013(pa)006:1091: e h+ye hi sogs kyis tshogs zhing dpag tu med pa mkha' khyab tu sad par byas la //
NK013(pa)006:1092: thugs rje lcags kyus thugs dam sogs dang /
NK013(pa)006:1093: sh+r+ai badz+ra am ku sha dzah de bzhin du /
NK013(pa)006:1096: g+han+de hohs dgug gzhug bcings mnyes par bya /
NK013(pa)006:1097: gsum pa mchod pa la gnyis kyi /
NK013(pa)006:1098: dang po ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:1099: rgyas par spro na cho ga rgyas pa'i skabs ltar ram /
NK013(pa)006:1101: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga d+h+au pe d+h+au /
NK013(pa)006:1103: sh+r+ai badz+ra r+aa ga l+aa s+ye h'u /
NK013(pa)006:1108: gnyis pa rdzas kyi mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:1109: zhal zas kyi phud rim par spros la /
NK013(pa)006:1111: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing //
NK013(pa)006:1112: byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:1113: gnyis su med par thim gyur nas //
NK013(pa)006:1114: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol //
NK013(pa)006:1115: hoh bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs
NK013(pa)006:1116: rnams la tshogs kyi mchod pa chen po 'bul zhing
NK013(pa)006:1117: mchis na / sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud mnyes shing tshim nas /
NK013(pa)006:1118: dam tshig nyams chag thams cad skongs te /
NK013(pa)006:1119: bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob par mdzad du gsol /
NK013(pa)006:1120: zhes 'dod yon lnga dang su ra to bcu drug
NK013(pa)006:1121: la sogs pa'i glu gar dang rol mo sna tshogs
NK013(pa)006:1122: pas mchod / bzhi pa tshogs la rol pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:1123: las kyi rdo rjes 'khor 'dus pa'i gtso bo la
NK013(pa)006:1124: phyag byas thabs shes kyi rdzas bsnol mar 'bul zhing
NK013(pa)006:1125: / mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dpal //
NK013(pa)006:1126: log rtog mtshan pa'i spros pa ngang gis zhi //
NK013(pa)006:1127: dam tshig bzhin las ci bder spyad nas kyang //
NK013(pa)006:1128: mnyam rdzogs chen po'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol //
NK013(pa)006:1130: des kyang pad+ma'i phyag rgya bskor zhing /
NK013(pa)006:1131: a la la hoh zhes len /
NK013(pa)006:1132: de nas gzhan rnams la yang rim par stob /
NK013(pa)006:1133: rnal 'byor pa rnams lha'i ting nge 'dzin gsal ba
NK013(pa)006:1134: la khyad par dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams rang gi
NK013(pa)006:1135: phung po khams dang skye mched nyid las mi gnyis
NK013(pa)006:1136: par shes pas nang gi sreg blugs kyi cho ga
NK013(pa)006:1137: ji lta ba'i dam tshig gis tshim par rol zhing
NK013(pa)006:1139: hoh bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon mched dang lcam
NK013(pa)006:1140: dral rnams kyis dza gad dpa' bo gsol ba 'gro
NK013(pa)006:1141: ba ma lus pa dbang du 'du bar gyur cig
NK013(pa)006:1142: / ma h+aa m+aam sa gsol bas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen por gyur cig /
NK013(pa)006:1143: rdo rje'i tshe gsol bas rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang lang tsho la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig /
NK013(pa)006:1144: zhal zas kyi bye brag mang po gsol bas zhi
NK013(pa)006:1145: khro'i phrin las kyi rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs la dbang
NK013(pa)006:1148: lnga pa lhag ma'i mchod pa ni /
NK013(pa)006:1149: lhag ma rnams gsog 'jog med par bsdus /
NK013(pa)006:1150: lha mchod pa'i lhag ma bsnan pa dkyil 'khor dang
NK013(pa)006:1151: ha cang mi nye ba'i shar lhor dri'i man+dala zlum
NK013(pa)006:1152: por byas pa'i steng du bzhag /
NK013(pa)006:1153: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba las khyad par lhag ma'i gnas su /
NK013(pa)006:1154: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he badz+ra tsakra man+da la b+h+r+aum /
NK013(pa)006:1155: lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid rdzogs pa gdan dang bcas pa'i nang gi dbus dang phyogs bzhir /
NK013(pa)006:1156: badz+ra d+h+rika dzi na dzika s+w+aam rat+na d+h+rika /
NK013(pa)006:1159: rigs kyi yab lnga skad cig gis gsal bar gyur /
NK013(pa)006:1160: gtor ma'i dam tshig gsang ba'i longs spyod 'dod yon
NK013(pa)006:1161: gyi phung po zad mi shes pas nam mkha' gang
NK013(pa)006:1163: lan gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlabs /
NK013(pa)006:1165: las kyi rdo rje byed par dbang bskur ba'i //
NK013(pa)006:1166: mkha' 'gro lhag sdud ma sring ging gi tshogs //
NK013(pa)006:1167: lhag ma kha chu'i dam la gtogs pa rnams //
NK013(pa)006:1168: dam tshig bzhin du mchod kyis gshegs su gsol //
NK013(pa)006:1169: hoh mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i
NK013(pa)006:1170: mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis sngon gyi thugs dam
NK013(pa)006:1171: dus las mi 'da' bar sgrub pa'i sdong grogs la
NK013(pa)006:1172: gshegs shig / e +aa ra li h+r+aim h+r+aim dzahmh'u
NK013(pa)006:1173: bam hoh d+aa ki ni h'u dzah zhes brjod cing
NK013(pa)006:1174: he ru ka'i dam rgya dpral bar bcings nas spyugs
NK013(pa)006:1175: pa' brda dang bcas pas spyan drangs pas /
NK013(pa)006:1176: mkha' 'gro ma so gnyis sprin gtibs pa bzhin byon te rigs lnga'i gtso bo la gtso bo bdun /
NK013(pa)006:1178: gzhan gsum la lnga lnga 'khril zhing sgo ma bzhi
NK013(pa)006:1179: gtso bo'i gdan gyi tshul du bzhugs pa la me
NK013(pa)006:1180: tog la sogs pas spyir mchod nas /
NK013(pa)006:1181: dmar gyi rak+ta gtor mar sbreng zhing /
NK013(pa)006:1182: he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo rgya dang bcas pas /
NK013(pa)006:1183: badz+ra d+aa ki n+ai pra t+aits+tshe mam ba lim te h'u phata /
NK013(pa)006:1185: bud+d+ha d+aa ki n+ai pra sogs nas phata /
NK013(pa)006:1186: rat+na d+aa ki n+ai sogs t+r+aam phata /
NK013(pa)006:1187: pad+ma d+aa ki n+ai sogs h+r+aihphata /
NK013(pa)006:1189: ces pas gtor ma phul la /
NK013(pa)006:1191: mkha' 'gro ging dang dbang phyug ma //
NK013(pa)006:1192: ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma brgyad //
NK013(pa)006:1193: pho nya la sogs lhag sdud tshogs //
NK013(pa)006:1194: dbal gyi pham phabs 'di gsol la //
NK013(pa)006:1195: bcol ba'i phrin las sgrub par mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:1196: ces brjod cing sman dang rak+tasa mchod nas /
NK013(pa)006:1197: hoh lhag sdud kyi dam tshig la gtogs pa'i mkha'
NK013(pa)006:1198: 'gro dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa
NK013(pa)006:1199: rnams lhag ma'i dam tshig 'dis tshims shing dgyes par
NK013(pa)006:1200: gyur te / dam tshig nyams chag thams cad skong nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srungs /
NK013(pa)006:1202: dge 'dun dang chos kyi rgyal srid skyongs /
NK013(pa)006:1204: sems can gyi phan bde spel /
NK013(pa)006:1205: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi stong grogs mdzod /
NK013(pa)006:1206: sngags 'chang rnams kyi phrin las sgrubs /
NK013(pa)006:1207: khyad par du dam tshig 'dir 'dus pa rnams kyi phyi nang gsang ba'i 'gal rkyen zhi ba dang /
NK013(pa)006:1208: mchog thun mong gi dngos grub ma lus pa myur du 'grub pa'i sdong grogs mdzod cig /
NK013(pa)006:1211: mgron rnams rang gnas su gshegs par bsam la gtor ma phyi rol du bskyal /
NK013(pa)006:1212: h'u zhes pas lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor rigs lnga rang la bstim nas man+dala kyang bsdu'o //
NK013(pa)006:1213: gnyis pa brtan ma bskyang ba ni /
NK013(pa)006:1214: phyi rol du brtan ma'i gtor ma sman phud kyis bran la /
NK013(pa)006:1215: tram rat+na s+pha ra na phata /
NK013(pa)006:1218: gtor ma'i rdul phra rab re re zhing rin po
NK013(pa)006:1219: che'i gur khang longs spyod zad mi shes pas nam
NK013(pa)006:1223: tshogs dang bka' yi tshogs bcas nyid //
NK013(pa)006:1224: khrag 'thung de bzhin nam mkha'i sku //
NK013(pa)006:1225: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs skyong ma rnams /
NK013(pa)006:1227: / 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:1228: bdag nyid chen mo la sogs bdud mo bzhi //
NK013(pa)006:1229: gangs dkar sha med la sogs gnod sbyin bzhi //
NK013(pa)006:1230: kong btsun de mo la sogs sman mo bzhi //
NK013(pa)006:1231: bod khams skyong ba'i che zhe chen mo rnams //
NK013(pa)006:1232: bran g.yog mang po'i 'khor dang bcas //
NK013(pa)006:1233: lhab lhub mang po'i rgyan dang bcas //
NK013(pa)006:1234: sil snyan mang po'i sgra dang bcas /
NK013(pa)006:1236: / 'dir byon dam skong phrin las mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:1237: che zhe chen mo khyed rnams kyang //
NK013(pa)006:1238: a su ra yi brag phug tu //
NK013(pa)006:1240: rlangs chen dpal gyi seng ge yis //
NK013(pa)006:1241: zhing chen stan la bkod nas kyang //
NK013(pa)006:1242: lag tu rdo rje gtad nas ni //
NK013(pa)006:1243: dbang bskur gsang ba'i mtshan nas brjod //
NK013(pa)006:1244: rdo rje 'chang gi gral du bzhag /
NK013(pa)006:1245: bod khams bsrung zhing skyong ba dang //
NK013(pa)006:1246: rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i grogs bya zhes //
NK013(pa)006:1247: ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:1248: g.yar dam gnyan po rjes dgongs la //
NK013(pa)006:1249: dam rdzas bka' yi gtor ma longs //
NK013(pa)006:1250: bcol ba'i phrin las grub par mdzod //
NK013(pa)006:1256: ma ma sring 'gro ma h'u b+h+yo h'u h'u /
NK013(pa)006:1258: ma h+aa pany+tsa sogs kyis sman raka sbreng /
NK013(pa)006:1260: ya hi gats+tshasa gshegs gsol byas la gtsang sar bskyal lo //
NK013(pa)006:1261: thun mtshams la 'jug pa'am nyal ba na /
NK013(pa)006:1262: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he h'u s+w+aa +aam h+aa zhes pas dkyil 'khor gsal btab la /
NK013(pa)006:1263: badz+ra pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)006:1264: sa ma ya hoh a nu r+aa go ham /
NK013(pa)006:1265: a nu r+aa ga ya mi /
NK013(pa)006:1266: dzahmh'u bam hoh bo d+hi tsit+ta s+pha ra na phata /
NK013(pa)006:1268: yab yum snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor mtshams nas byang
NK013(pa)006:1269: chub sems kyi 'od zer gyi sprin 'phros pas snod
NK013(pa)006:1270: bcud thams cad dag cing 'od gsal bar byas /
NK013(pa)006:1273: dag pa'i snod bcud gzhal yas khang srung 'khor dang bcas pa la thim /
NK013(pa)006:1274: gzhal yas khang gi rgyan thams cad yab rnams la thim /
NK013(pa)006:1275: dngos po thams cad yum rnams la /
NK013(pa)006:1276: lha thams cad gtso bo rdo rje sems dpa' la /
NK013(pa)006:1277: yum thams cad dbyings phyug ma la /
NK013(pa)006:1279: de ye shes sems dpa' la /
NK013(pa)006:1280: de ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' la /
NK013(pa)006:1282: h'u gyen rdzogs n+aa da'i bar thim nas rnam par
NK013(pa)006:1283: rtog med lhun grub nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang la
NK013(pa)006:1284: mnyam par bzhag / nyal ba las langs pa'am /
NK013(pa)006:1288: rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa snang stong sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i skur ldang ngo //
NK013(pa)006:1289: bzhi pa go bgo zhing lus bsrung ba ni /
NK013(pa)006:1290: rang nyid rdor sems su gsal ba'i spyi bor /
NK013(pa)006:1291: mgrin par +aah snying gar h'u yig rnams kyis mtshan par gyur /
NK013(pa)006:1292: badz+ra k+aa w+aa tsi rak+sha ham /
NK013(pa)006:1294: lus thams cad rdo rje rgya gram gyi go chas
NK013(pa)006:1295: zhu lugs su g.yogs pas sgo gsum rdo rje gsum
NK013(pa)006:1296: dang dbyer med du bcings par bltas la /
NK013(pa)006:1297: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
NK013(pa)006:1298: sku gsung thugs kyis kun la khyab //
NK013(pa)006:1299: ces brjod cing nga rgyal bya /
NK013(pa)006:1301: mdzub mo g.yas su t+r+aam las khro bo gnod sbyin
NK013(pa)006:1302: nag po phyag gnyis kyi mche ba dang sdigs mdzub
NK013(pa)006:1303: / g.yon du las khro bo mi 'chi thabs sbyor
NK013(pa)006:1304: dmar po rgya gram dang sdigs mdzub can du bskyed
NK013(pa)006:1305: / la / lte ba snying ga ltag pa dang /
NK013(pa)006:1306: dpral ba spyi bo'i gnas lnga ru /
NK013(pa)006:1307: trum zhes brjod bzhin par mdzub mo gnyis bsnol nas rim par reg pas /
NK013(pa)006:1308: gnas de dang der khro bo gnyis po zung re
NK013(pa)006:1309: zhabs bsnol thabs su zhal phyir gzigs te bsrung ba'i
NK013(pa)006:1310: las mdzad pa'i thugs ka nas rdo rje lu gu
NK013(pa)006:1311: rgyud byung nas srungs shing brtan par byas la /
NK013(pa)006:1312: rat+na mu ku ta a b+hi shiny+tsa tram tram /
NK013(pa)006:1313: zhes rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur bar bsam /
NK013(pa)006:1314: rat+na ma le a b+hi shiny+tsa tram tram /
NK013(pa)006:1315: rin po che'i phreng ba bcings par bsam mo //
NK013(pa)006:1316: +aar+ya lam b+ho d+ha ra a b+hi shiny+tsa h+r+aihh+r+aihdara mthing
NK013(pa)006:1317: dmar gyi cod pan gyis dbu brgyan par bsam mo
NK013(pa)006:1318: // gu h+ya sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK013(pa)006:1319: zhes brtan par bsam zhing yi ge brgya pa lan
NK013(pa)006:1320: gsum la sogs par bzlas pas shin tu brtan par
NK013(pa)006:1321: byas la / dge ba bsngo zhing bkra shis brjod pa rnams kyis mtha' brgyan par bya'o //
NK013(pa)006:1322: lnga pa spyod lam rgyun gyi rnal 'byor ni /
NK013(pa)006:1323: snod bcud snang grags thams cad sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rang bzhin du shes shing /
NK013(pa)006:1324: za nyal 'gro 'chags sogs spyod lam thams cad thabs
NK013(pa)006:1325: shes khyad par can gyis zin pas don yod par
NK013(pa)006:1326: bya'o // de ltar dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba yi //
NK013(pa)006:1327: bsnyen sgrub lam gyi rim pa la 'jug pa'i //
NK013(pa)006:1328: las byang snying po'i don dril nyung ngu 'di //
NK013(pa)006:1329: rang dang skal mnyam rnams la phan phyir bris //
NK013(pa)006:1330: rang bzo'i nongs pa mchis na mkhas la bshags //
NK013(pa)006:1331: dam pa'i rjes 'brang legs pa'i cha mchis na //
NK013(pa)006:1332: dge des lam bzang 'dir zhugs skal bzang rnams //
NK013(pa)006:1333: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob shog /
NK013(pa)006:1334: ces rdor sems sgyu d+r+wa'i bsnyen pa'i las byang nyung
NK013(pa)006:1335: ngur dril ba 'di ni gter chen chos kyi rgyal
NK013(pa)006:1336: po'i gsung las nye bar bsdus te sh+aakya'i dge slong
NK013(pa)006:1337: pad+ma badz+rasa bris pa dge legs 'phel //
